speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I’m not in the mood for your crap!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand this can be frustrating. I'm here to discuss your account. Can you please verify your date of birth for me?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the f*** do I need to tell you anything? Just get to the point!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your patience. I can’t provide any details without verifying your identity first. Just your date of birth, please.

speaker: Customer
text: Fine! It’s July 15, 1985. Now can we move on, or are you gonna waste my time more?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. I have your information now. You currently have an outstanding balance of $500. What is your plan for repayment?

speaker: Customer
text: I don’t have that kind of money! You guys are ruthless! Just leave me the f*** alone!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your concern, but we can work together to find a solution. Would you be willing to set up a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: A payment plan? You think I have time for your bullsh*t? Just stop calling me!

speaker: Agent
text: I hear you. I'm here to help. If you change your mind, you can always reach out to us. Just remember, we’re available to assist.

speaker: Customer
text: Yeah, whatever. Just don’t call me again, you hear me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time today. I’ll make sure to note your preference. Have a good day.
